#summary How to enable the C4J contracts

Create a folder somewhere on your harddisk (let's call it $FOLDER from now on) and add those two JAR-Files to it:



Edit eclipse.ini and add the following arguments at the end:

{{{
-cp $FOLDER/javassist.jar
-javaagent:$FOLDER/c4j.jar=trace=false,loglevel=warn,exit-on-unknown-contract=false
-ea
}}}
